HomePage.title: Digimon Story Time Stranger Global Guide ‚Äî Walkthroughs, Database & Tools
HomePage.description: All-in-one Digimon Story Time Stranger companion with curated walkthroughs, multilingual coverage, and battle-ready planning utilities.

hero.title: Crack every mystery in Digimon Story Time Stranger
hero.description: Access structured walkthroughs, evolution planning tools, and live update coverage built for explorers from Tokyo to Paris.

stats.title: Why strategists count on the Global Guide

features.title: Built for completionists and competitive tamers
features.description: Plan every story beat with data-backed tactics, live update tracking, and collaborative tooling.

items.title: Structured walkthrough matrix
items.description: Arc dashboards spotlight branching choices, affinity shifts, and mandatory prep work.

items.title: Cross-linked data vault
items.description: Digimon, items, and map intel share relational IDs for instant context while browsing.

items.title: Simulation-first toolset
items.description: Model evolutions, ability builds, and squad resistances before investing resources.

items.title: Localization-first rollouts
items.description: English, Japanese, Spanish, and French releases ship together with hreflang metadata.

templates.title: Launchpad for every playstyle
templates.subtitle: Starter packs that accelerate planning sessions

items.title: Raid squad blueprint
items.description: Pre-built compositions optimised for elemental coverage and aura bonuses.

items.title: Localization kit
items.description: Glossaries, translation guidance, and style references for community editors.

pricing.subtitle: Scale with your exploration pace
pricing.description: Start free with public data access and add pro capabilities like saved squads when you need them.

testimonials.title: Trusted by global Digimon communities
testimonials.description: Writers, theorycrafters, and tournament teams share how the Global Guide powers their runs.

items.name: Mira Takahashi
items.quote: ‚ÄúThe bilingual arc dashboards save me hours every patch. Our Discord wouldn‚Äôt raid without them anymore.‚Äù

items.name: Leo Mart√≠nez
items.quote: ‚ÄúEvolution Planner plus localized loot tables keeps our weekend marathons smooth and spoiler-free.‚Äù

items.name: Claire Moreau
items.quote: ‚ÄúBeing able to submit updates and see them cross-linked to maps instantly changed our workflow.‚Äù

cta.title: Ready to optimise your Stranger journey?
cta.description: Bookmark the hub, sync your locale preferences, and share feedback to shape new features.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before diving in.

items.question: Is the data refreshed after every content patch?
items.answer: Yes. Database entries and tool stats refresh automatically after patch notes are validated by editors.

items.question: Can I export team builds to share with my group?
items.answer: Team Builder supports share codes now, with direct Discord embeds arriving in the next milestone.

items.question: Do I need an account to browse guides?
items.answer: No. Public walkthroughs stay free. Accounts unlock saved squads, reminders, and ad-free mode.

items.question: How are translations handled?
items.answer: Core updates ship in English, Japanese, Spanish, and French simultaneously with community-driven review rounds.

faq.title: Digimon Story Time Stranger FAQ
faq.subtitle: Key answers for strategy planners and new tamers.

items.question: How often are guides and database entries updated?
items.answer: Major updates ship within 24 hours of a patch, with community verified notes merged continuously afterward.

items.question: Can I contribute localized content or corrections?
items.answer: Yes. Use the community submission workflow to send guides, translation fixes, or data corrections for editorial review.

items.question: Will premium features be required for the planning tools?
items.answer: Evolution, skill, and team builders remain free during MVP while we evaluate optional pro features such as sync and notifications.

items.question: How do I know if new events affect my squad setup?
items.answer: Track the events calendar for aura recommendations and link jumps to the boss strategy archive for suggested adjustments.
